Nuru is 34 years old. She is married and has 2 children, ages 2 and 13. She runs a cafe, which she began in March 2007. This business makes a monthly profit of about $135. Nuru cooks and serves the food from 6am to 10pm daily.

Nuru hopes for a loan to buy more food items in order to increase the quantity of sales. She will share this loan with her subgroup, who have businesses in poultry and also food sales.

loans.use: to buy food stock

loans.name: Zuwena's Upendo Group

texts.en:
Zuwena is 45 years old. She is married and has 5 children who are between the ages of 21 and 28. She works as a food vendor from 9am to noon every day, which she began doing in 2005. From this business, she makes a monthly profit of about $45 from breakfast and snack sales.

Zuwena hopes for a loan to increase her sales. She will share this loan with Elizabeth, who is also a food vendor in her neighborhood in Dar es Salaam.

loans.use: to buy food stock

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
The business that Maria Teresa Garcia has is one of selling sandals and flip-flops in the local market located in the city of Leon, Nicaragua. She began her business 8 years ago with one thousand cordobas (currency name) she got through a loan several years ago. After purchasing her first batch of merchandise, she paid off her loan by herself and uses part of the money to buy food for her elderly mother.

She had a rough time at first since she would walk the streets of Leon with her heavy cart. She then realized she really needed the job because she is a single mother. She wishes to get a loan through Ceprodel who has been able to provide her with the necessary credit. She wishes to purchase her own stand at the central market and at the same time continue supporting her mother.

Translated by Maria Peterson, Kiva Volunteer.

El negocio al que se dedica la señora Maria Teresa G. es a la venta de chinelas y sandalias en el mercado central de la ciudad de León en Nicaragua. Desde hace 8 años inició su negocio invirtiendo un capital de Un mil córdobas obtenidos por un préstamo a un prestamista. Luego que compra la primera mercadería, muy responsablemente busca la manera de pagar el préstamo y comenzar a trabajar por si sola para llevar el alimento a su mamá que es de edad avanzada.

Sus inicios con el negocio fue por mucho tiempo muy duro ya que se trasladaba ambulantemente por las calles de León con un pesado carretón y a la vez con un saco de chinelas siendo esta una faena diaria. Al estar consiente de la necesidad de trabajo y por ser una dama soltera decide solicitar prestamos en Ceprodel que hasta el momento le han beneficiado con la adquisición de un propio local en las afueras del mercado Central y a la vez le ha ayudado para llevar el alimento a su querida madre.

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise for her business (flip-flops and sandals)

loans.name: Blanca Nubia

texts.es:
The city of Leon is characterized by its hard-working men and women, amongst whom we can find Mrs. Blanca M.. Mrs. Blanca has been selling hot dogs and sodas for 8 years in a street stand she owns. Everyday, Mrs. Blanca moves the cart from her home to the outskirts of the central market which is far away.

The harsh economic situation she has been through for a long time has taken her to work this difficult business since she does not receive help from anyone being single and having no children to look after.

Since three years ago, she has smartly gone through the loan process 10 times with Ceprodel. She explains that the loans have helped her extraordinarily since she has bought a new cart where she can carry her products, and she has bought a greater quantity of sodas and ingredients with which she prepares her delicious hot dogs.

Translated from Spanish by Luis López Martinelli, Kiva Volunteer.


La ciudad de León se caracteriza por tener hombres y mujeres muy trabajadores, entre estas personas encontramos a la señora Blanca M. quien desde hace 8 años se dedica a la venta de hot dog y gaseosas en un carretón propio al que diariamente debe de trasladar desde su casa a las afueras del mercado central que por cierto es un alarga distancia.

La difícil situación económica que ha atravesado por mucho tiempo la ha llevado a que se dedique a este pesado negocio ya que no recibe ayuda de nadie por ser soltera y sin hijos a su cargo.

Muy inteligentemente ha realizado 10 créditos en Ceprodel desde hace Tres años los que comenta que le han beneficiado extraordinariamente ya que ha comprado un nuevo carretón donde portar sus productos, además ha comprado mayores cantidades de gaseosas y los ingredientes para elaborar sus deliciosos hot dog.

loans.use: Purchasing supplies

loans.name: Djiito 1 Group

texts.fr:
We are a group which has grown since we received our first Kiva loan through partner SEM. Our first experience proved to be very beneficial and today we have the courage to incorporate young women who, thanks to the renewal of our loan, will be able to receive training which will ensure our labor supply and will help young people in our area by ensuring them a better future. Thus with the money we will receive, we will buy basic inputs to carry out our work, which is to continue dying fabric, but this time on a larger scale in our eco-village. We thank you deeply for your belief in us with which we assure you that we will make sure your investment will be sustainable with the support of these young women who want to become financially indpendent. 

Translated from French by Kiva Volunteer Liana Bianchi

Nous sommes un groupe qui s'est agrandi après que nous ayons reçu un premier prêt de Kiva à travers 

son partenaire qui est SEM. Notre première expérience s'est avérée très bénéfique et aujourd'hui, nous 

avons eu le courage d'intégrer des jeunes filles qui grâce au renouvellement de notre prêt, pourront avoir 

une formation pour assurer la relève et aussi aider au maintien des jeunes dans notre localité en leur 

assurant un avenir meilleur et plein de perspectives pour les échéances futures. ainsi donc avec l'argent 

que nous allons recevoir, nous allons acheter des produits de premières nécessité pour executer les 

taches qui nous attendent. C'est à dire continuer à faire de la teinture, mais cette fois-ci à grande échelle 

dans notre écovillage. Nous vous remercions vivement pour la confiance et nous vous assurons que grâce 

à votre confiance, nous allons faire en sorte que votre investissement soit perenne avec l'appui des jeunes f

illes qui veulent devenir indépendantes financièrement.

loans.use: Purchase of raw materials for dying of fabric and clothes

loans.name: Mayra Maritza

texts.es:
Mayra Gonzales is a single mother with two small children and a granddaughter for whom she is the sole supporter. She sells coconut and peanuts on the outskirts of the central market in Leon. She started the business 12 years ago with a capital of C $ 600 (600 cordobas) which was all the money she had saved throughout her life.

Like anything else, the beginning was difficult when she began selling on the streets of Leon with a small case that contained her products, but then she decided to borrow from Ceprodel and she managed to invest in the purchase of a wooden table. This table has begun to deteriorate during the past few months due to the fact that she sets up her table outdoors in a bad location and due also to the winter rains.

Mayra's credit has been very good with Ceprodel. She had had 22 credit instances and has paid in a timely and responsible manner.

Translated from Spanish by Mayra Gould, Kiva volunteer.

Mayra Gonzales es madre soltera, con dos pequeños hijos y una nieta a quien tiene la obligación de mantener por ser el único sustento de su familia. Se dedica a la venta de coco y maní en las afueras del mercado central en León. Desde hace 12 años comenzó el negocio con un capital de C$ 600 (600 córdobas) obtenido por ahorros personales de toda su vida.

Como todo inicio es duro, comenzó vendiendo en las calles de León con una panita donde contenía sus productos pero al haber decidido solicitar créditos en Ceprodel, logró invertir en la compra de una mesa de madera que a medida de que han pasado los meses se ha venido deteriorando ya que la coloca en las afueras del mercado en un lugar al aire libre donde recibe las lluvias de invierno por no tener buenas condiciones en su localidad.

Su record crediticio es de 22 créditos con Ceprodel pagados muy responsablemente en tiempo y forma.

loans.use: To purchase coconut and peanuts (Compra de coco y maní)

loans.name: Narzullo

texts.ru:
Narzullo J. is 30 years old, has a high school education, is married and has 1 child. Narzullo sells winter men’s clothing at the central market of Kurgan-Tube. His main products are men’s sweaters and he will use his loan to purchase male winter jackets. As a result, residents of Kurgan-Tube and nearby areas will be able to purchase winter clothing as the other market is 100KM away. Narzullo plans to pay back the loan over 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Джайлобов Нарзулло, возраст – 30 лет, образование среднее, женат, имеет 1 ребёнка. Нарзулло занимается продажей зимней мужской одежды на центральном рынкем в городе Курган-Тюбе. Так как основной его товар это мужские зимние свитера, на полученный кредит он планиует приобрести теплые мужские зиминие куртки. Так как в зимний сезон они пользуются спросом, жители города Курган-Тюбе и близлежащих районов будут иметь возможность приобрести зимную одежду, так как другой рынок находится в 100 км от города. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase winter jackets

loans.name: Ahliddin

texts.ru:
Ahliddin Z. is 27 years old, has a college education and is an economist by training. He is married and has 2 children. Ahliddin owns a car which he uses to offer taxi services to residents of Qurgan-Tube. Ahliddin will use his loan to purchase equipment that will allow him to use gas instead of gasoline in his car. This will allow him to control his costs and to not raise his fares. Local residents will be able to take advantage of Ahliddin’s lower priced fares, as many cannot afford the fare increases resulting from increasing gasoline prices. Ahliddin will pay back the loan over 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Зайниддинов Ахлиддин, возраст – 27 лет, образование высшее, по специальности – экономист, женат, имеет 2 детей. Ахлиддин имеет собственную машину, на которой оказывает услуги такси населению города Курган-Тюбе. Так как в настоящее время цены на бензин ежедневно растут, что увеличивает плату за услуги такси и не каждый житель может себе этого позволить. Ахлиддин на полученный кредит планирует купить и установить на свой автомобиль газовое оборудование. Это даст ему возможность не повышать цену за проезд, так как цены на газ растут не так быстро, как на бензин. Жители смогут пользоваться его услугами по цене ниже других таксистов, использующих в качестве топлива бензин. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase car equipment

loans.name: Asooda

texts.en:
Ms. Asuda is a 36-year-old married woman with three children. She is a farmer and lives with her family in Saatli, situated in the central part of Azerbaijan.

She started her business in 1990, when she purchased one cow with money she had saved up. The work is hard but interesting and takes a lot of effort. Asuda purchases calves, breeds them and sells to the butcher, who works at the local big market. Currently, her income is not enough to cover all of Asuda’s family expenses. To increase her income, Asuda has to invest some money to increase her herd. This summer she is applying for a loan of $500 to buy four calves. She hopes eventually to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Gozi

texts.ru:
Gozi S. is 67 years old, has a high school education, is married and has 10 children. Gozi owns a farm and would like to purchase fertilizer, wheat for planting and fuel. After collecting the harvest, Gozi will use part of it for personal use in flour and bread and will sell part of it to local residents at a below market price. He will pay the loan back over 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Шодмонов Гози, возраст – 67 лет, образование среднее, пженат, имеет 10 детей. Гози имеет дехканско-фермерское хозяйство. Так как вскоре начнётся посевной сезон, Гози хочеи приобрести удобрения, семяна пшеницу и горюче-смазочоные материалы для засева пшеницы на имеющейся у него земли. После сбора урожая, часть его он будет использовать в личных целях, а именно для производства муки и выпечки хлеба для личного пользования, а часть продаст местным жителям по цене ниже рыночной. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 11 месяцев.

loans.use: Fertilize land and plant wheat

loans.name: Djiito 2 Group

texts.fr:
We have already benefitted from one loan which put us on the road to financial independence and we hope to continue our activities with a renewal, adding training of young village girls who are becoming interested in the projects we are leading in our eco-village. This capital will allow us to buy raw materials in necessary quantity which we will dye and put up for sale in reception centers in our Department and other villages in Senegal. The most positive part is that the interest these young girls are taking in this aspect of production, which until now was done abroad, will make our work sustainable. To all the benefits, training will be added, and all thanks to Kiva. Now the young village girls and women know that they can make it with a common project and little good will.

Translated from French by Liana Bianchi, Kiva Volunteer.

Nous avions déjà bénéficié d'un premier prêt qui nous a mis sur la bonne voie pour l'indépendance financière et nous espèrons qu'avec ce renouvellement faire la même activité en y ajoutant la formation des jeunes filles du village qui commence à s'intéresser aux activités que nous sommes entrain de mener dans notre écovillage. Les fonds vont nous permettre de pouvoir acheter en quantité suffisante les produits bruts que nous allons teindre et mis en vente dans les structures d'accueuil qui existent dans notre département et dans les autre villes du Sénégal. La partie la plus positive est que les jeunes filles se sont intéressées aux activités et cela va permettre de rendre perenne cet aspect de la production qui jusqu'ici, nous venait de l'etranger. Donc aux bénéfices; s'ajoutera la formation et tout cei grâce à Kiva. Maintenant toutes les filles du village et les femmes savent qu'elles peuvent s'en sortir si elles ont un projet commun et avec un peu de bonne volonté.

loans.use: Purchase of raw materials for dying and training of young women

loans.name: Turdikul

texts.ru:
Turdikul S. is 74 years old, has a high school education, is married and has 8 children. Turdikul has been raising livestock for 20 years. He plans to use the loan to purchase several calves to fatten and sell. He uses this to supplement his pension which is very small. Every 40-45 days he plans to sell the livestock and purchase new calves. He currently makes sour milk products as well and sells them to residents of Yavan. Turdikul will pay back his loan over 11 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Саидов Турдикул, возраст – 74 года, образование среднее, женат, имеет 8 детей. Турдикул занимается разведением крупного роагтого скота уже в течение 20 лет. На полученный кредит он хочет приобрести несколько бычков для откормки и продажи. Таким образом он получает дополнительный доход, так как размер получаемой пенсии очень маленький. Каждые 40-45 дней он планирует продавать скот и приобретать молодых бычков по более низкой цене. Также в настоящее всремя он занимается производством кисло-молочных продуктов. Эти продукты он продаёт жителям города Явана. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 11 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase of livestock

loans.name: Gilas

texts.ru:
Ms. Gilas M. lives in the suburb of the town of Saatli, Azerbaijan located in the South Caucasus. Gilas is 44. She shares a small village house with her parents providing for them in their old age. Gilas small income comes from sale of milk of the two cows that she purchased two years ago. The daily 8 liters of milk from the two cows sell for about $1.50. Obviously, this is not enough to sustain Ms. M.’s family. She plans to use this loan to purchase another milk cow. Gilas hopes that in 8 months she will be able to increase her income from milk sales by 100%.

Translated from Russian by Aleksandr Zhuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Г-жа Гилас живет в пригороде Саатлы Республики Азербайджан расположенном в Южном Кавказе. Ей 44 года и она живёт в месте с её родителями в деревенском домике, обеспечивая как можно их старость. Она имеет доход, очень низкий с2-x коров, которых они купили 2 года тому назад, продавая молоко на местном рынке. Ежедневный надой с коров составляет 8 литров, т.е. приблизительно 1 доллар и 50 центов. Этого конечно не хватает на удовлетворение нужд семьи. В настоящее время Гилас обратилась в микро кредитную организацию "Нормикро" - партнёру КИВА с заявлением о предоставлении ей кредита на сумму $600 для покупки телёнка дойной породы. Таким образом через 8 месяцев она планирует увеличить свой доход от продажи молока на 100 процентов

loans.use: To buy a milk cow

loans.name: Ashur

texts.ru:
Ashur H. is 50 years old, has a high school education, is married and has 10 children. Ashur would like to purchase fertilizer, seeds and fuel in order to fertilize his land and to plant wheat. He has 20 years of experience in agriculture. Ashur will use a portion of his harvest for personal uses – making flour and baking bread. He will sell the rest of his harvest to local residents as many cannot afford to purchase flour and instead purchase wheat for further processing as it is much cheaper. Ashur will pay back the loan over 11 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Худойбердиев Ашур – 50 лет, образование среднее, женат, имеет 10 детей. На полученный кредит Ашур хочет приобрести удобрения, семена пшеницы, а также горюче-смазочные материалы для обработки земли и посева пшеницы. Его опыт в обработке земли составляет 20 лет. Часть полученного урожая будет использована им в личных целях, то есть для переработки в муку и дальнейшей выпечки хлеба для употребления, другую часть урожая он планирует продать местным жителям, так как многие жители не имеют возможность приобретать муку, а приобретают зерно для дальнейшей переработки и выпечки хлеба – это намного дешевле, чем приобретать готовую муку не отечественного производства. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 11 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Gulboy

texts.ru:
Gulboy Karahodjaev is 60 years old, married and has 6 children. He has a High school education. Gulboy owns several hectares of land that were given to him from the presidential fund. The sowing season is approaching, but Gulboy does not have enough funds to purchase seeds. He plans to use the obtained loan to purchase mineral fertilizer, wheat seeds, fuel and machine oil. A portion of the obtained crops will be used for personal needs while the other portion will be sold to the locals at a relatively low price. Most people living in the area use wheat to make flower and bake bread for personal consumption. Gulboy is planing to repay the loan over a period of 11 months.

Translated from Russian by Jane Mazur, Kiva volunteer

Караходжаев Гулбой – 60 лет, образование среднее, женат, имеет 6 детей. Гулбой имеет несколько гектаров земли, выделенную ему из президентского фонда. В настоящее время наступает посевной сезон, но у Гулбоя нет достаточно средств для засева пшеницы. На полученный кредит он планирует приобрести минеральные удобрения, семена пшеницы и горюче-смазочные материалы. Часть собранного урожая он будет использовать в личных целях, другая часть будет реализована местному населению по более низким ценам, так как большая часть населения использует зерно на производство муки и выпечки хлеба для личного потребления. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 11 месяцев.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer and wheat seeds

loans.name: Aynoor

texts.en:
Ms. Aynoor is a low income vulnerable woman. She is 27, lives in the village of Saatli town in the south-central flat area of Azerbaijan Republic in the Caucasus region.

Aynoor with her brother (he is pictured) has a small herd of Dairy cows. They sell 60 liters of milk per day to the local milk processing shop and to the super market. The trade is good and Aynoor can see that she could sell more milk. This requires more cattle. Aynoor decided to buy another cow in order to increase her monthly income. She is asking for a loan of $500 for the purpose of buying a cow to increase the number of cattle in her herd.

loans.use: To buy another cow

loans.name: Nicolaza

texts.es:
Nicolaza is a mother who has put forth much effort and work to improve her home. She is a native of the small town of Capachica, and with the wish to progress in the company of her beloved family, she decided to leave the town which saw her birth. Currently, she has taken root in the city of Juliaca, where she has a small restaurant inside the market, Cerro Colorado. She began this work ten years ago. At first, she worked as a cook in a restaurant. After discovering her talents for cooking, she decided to save and acquire adequate means to open her own restaurant. Thanks to this job, she can grant her dear children secondary education and soon, higher education. The wish of this hard working mother is to finish the construction of her humble abode in order to grand stability and security to the members of her beloved family. We are making her petition possible so that soon she may realize her dreams.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva volunteer.

Nicolaza es una madre que a base de mucho esfuerzo y trabajo fue sacando adelante su hogar, ella es natural del pueblito de Capachica, con el deseo de progresar en compañía de su querida familia, decidió partir del pueblo que la vio nacer. Actualmente radica en la ciudad de Juliaca, donde tiene un pequeño restaurante en el interior del mercado, Cerro Colorado. Ella inició esta labor hace 10 años, en un principio trabajando como cocinera en un restaurante, después de descubrir sus cualidades para la cocina decidió ahorrar y conseguir los medios adecuados para abrir su propio restaurante, gracias a este oficio puede brindarle a sus queridos hijos estudios secundarios y dentro de poco estudios superiores. El deseo de esta esforzada madre es terminar de construir su humilde domicilio para brindarles estabilidad y seguridad a los miembros de su amada familia. Posibilitemos su petición para que dentro de poco pueda cristalizar sus sueños.

loans.use: Injection of capital to finish construction of her humble abode.

loans.name: Virgen De Las Mercedes Group

texts.en:
Virgen D. las Mercedes is a small rural community bank of FINCA Peru’s Wari project, which provides its credit with education services in the rural areas of Huancavelica. Huancavelica is considered one of the poorest regions of Peru and has many limitations, being a very mountainous area (the altituD. ranges from 6,000 to 17,000 feet above sea level), the cold, the difficulty of growing crops and the lack of an adequate infrastructure of roads and communication systems.

BCR Virgen D. las Mercedes has its base in the capital of the province of Churcampa, which is located at over 10,000 feet above sea level. Currently the bank has completed 2 loan cycles in just one year of existence with 17 female borrowers. Some of the group members live in small communities outsiD. the city of Churcampa, in places like El Carmen and Chupas, more than an hour of walking distance away.

The members of the bank, during their one year in FINCA Peru, besides having learned to be responsible and punctual, are learning more and more about savings and how to invest their loans. The group was able to save over 5,500 soles (about $1,800) in the first 2 loan cycles and will continue to save in the future. For all members, the main use of the savings is for the education of their children: buying school uniforms, supplies, books and even to pay for entering primary or secondary school. Another dream they have for the use of their savings is to be able to make renovations to their houses, like constructing another floor or changing the roof to a more sustainable one.

All members have different enterprises, ranging from raising guinea pigs, having a kiosk with sweets and juices close to the primary school, selling food and ice creams, buying and selling small animals, selling potatoes, selling chicken or having grocery stores.

Every member has a different testimony, as is the case of 36-year-old Mary O. C., who has a small grocery store in the central square of Churcampa, where she also sells homemaD. sweets. As with many women, she has more than one occupation: she also buys and sells chicken. The chicken she buys in a major city that is more than 8 hours away by public transport. Her dream is to grow her business and keep on saving to be able to pay for the education of her 3 children. Her new loan she will use for buying more groceries for her store.

Another story is the one of Edith A. G., who has a grocery store and buys and sells small animals like sheep and lamb. Those are the businesses she runs during the whole year, but living in a rural area, she also has fields of corn and is waiting for the harvest in May to be able to sell her corn. Her new loan she will invest in buying more small animals.

As the women of the group have different businesses, different businesses require different loans. The loans range from 200 soles, 400 soles, and 600 soles up to 1200 soles, and the total of the loans reaches 8,900 soles among the 17 members.

loans.use: As the women of the group have different businesses, different businesses require different loans. The loans range from 200 soles, 400 soles, and 600 soles up to 1200 soles, and the total of the loans reaches 8,900 soles among the 17 members.

loans.name: John

texts.es:
John Rafael is 40 years old. He is humble but a very hard-working father. He is a native of Arequipa and currently has taken root in the city of Juliaca. He learned and inherited the noble job of cobbler from his father, which allows him to pay for the necessities of his home and, more importantly, that of his small child, who is the light of his eyes and the reason for his efforts. This hard-working and agile father starts his daily work at 8AM and finishes at 6PM, untiringly receiving all types of shoes to fix and transform into new. With his patience and ability to make each job better, he satisfies his customers’ orders. John’s wish is to acquire raw material in order to continue to efficiently dedicate himself to his noble job. As a result, he requires a loan of money which he can promise to repay in six months. John greatly appreciates your collaboration.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva volunteer.

John Rafael de 40 años de edad, es un humilde pero muy hacendoso padre. Él es natural de Arequipa y actualmente radica en la ciudad de Juliaca. Este noble trabajo de zapatero lo aprendió y heredó de su padre, permitiéndole así cubrir las necesidades de su hogar y sobre todo la de su pequeño niño, quien es la luz de sus ojos y la razón de su esfuerzo. Este laborioso y ágil padre inicia su faena diaria a las 8:00 de la mañana y la culmina a las 6:00 de la tarde, recibiendo incansable todo tipo de calzados para arreglarlos y transformarlos en nuevos, complementado con su paciencia y habilidad hace de cada trabajo el mejor, cumpliendo así satisfactoriamente con las solicitudes de sus clientes. El deseo de Don John es adquirir materia prima para seguir dedicándose eficientemente a su noble labor, para eso requiere obtener un préstamo de dinero que se compromete a reembolsarlo en un período de seis meses. El señor John agradecerá mucho tu colaboración.

loans.use: Capital to acquire some tools in order to fulfill his customers’ orders.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
We find Paulina inside her small sewing workshop. She conducts this work with only one sewing machine right now. As a result of the large quantity of orders, she needs to acquire another machine so she may satisfy the orders. Fortunately, the good service that she offers and the good materials with which she works helps her to progress her small factory. Thanks to this job, which she performs well from 8AM until the late hours of the night, she can cover the costs of her home and of the education for her four dear children. Paulina’s loan is projected to be invested in the purchase of another sewing machine. Paulina needs your help in order to continue progressing.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva volunteer.

Encontramos a la señora Paulina al interior de su pequeño taller de confección de buzos, ella se dedica a esta labor con tan solo con una máquina de coser ahora; debido a la gran cantidad de solicitudes requiere adquirir otra máquina y así cumplir satisfactoriamente cada uno de sus pedidos. Afortunadamente el buen servicio que ofrece y los buenos materiales con los que trabaja la ayudan a progresar con su pequeña fábrica, gracias a este oficio que desempeña hábilmente a partir de las ocho de la mañana hasta altas horas de la noche puede cubrir las necesidades de su hogar y los estudios de sus cuatro queridos hijos. La solicitud que hace doña Paulina es debido a que tiene proyectado invertirlo en la compra de otra máquina de coser. Doña Paulina requiere de tu apoyo para seguir progresando.

loans.use: Purchase an additional sewing machine.

loans.name: María Leucadia

texts.es:
The delicious potajes, (stews) that Mrs. Leucadia cooks has made her restaurant the most well known in her area. She has been dedicated to this restaurant for 3 years. She began by selling mouth watering lunches as a traveling saleswoman from a small bicycle that she outfitted to serve and distribute her product. Little by little she began making more money and with her profits and so decided to rent and refurbish a small store in the inner city market of Cerro Colorado in the city Juliaca. Thanks to her diligence, perseverance and to her delicious foods and stews she makes, her restaurant has become one of the most visited places in the market. She has been able to make considerable profits that she uses to support her family. Mrs. Leucadia would like to purchase more tables and chairs in order to finish refurbishing her restaurant, and then be able to offer a better service and more comfortable atmosphere to her customers. To solidify her plans, she needs your help and is asking for a loan. Help us to make the dreams of Leucadia come true.

Translated from Spanish to English by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

Los deliciosos potajes que prepara doña Leucadia están haciendo posible que su restaurante sea el más concurrido de su zona. Ella se viene dedicando a este oficio hace tres años; inició vendiendo sus deliciosos almuerzos en forma ambulatoria y en un pequeño triciclo que adecuó para la comercialización de sus menús, pero poco a poco conforme iba obteniendo sus ganancias decidió alquilar e implementar un local al interior del mercado Cerro Colorado de la ciudad de Juliaca, gracias a su diligencia, perseverancia y a los deliciosos y variados potajes que prepara se convirtió en uno de los lugares más visitados permitiéndole obtener considerables ingresos económicos para la manutención de su familia. El deseo de Doña Leucadia es comprar mesas y sillas para terminar de implementar su restaurante, de esa manera brindará mayor comodidad y bienestar a sus clientes. Para concretar este anhelo requiere de tu ayuda y hace la solicitud de un préstamo. Ayudemos a cristalizar los sueños de Leucadia.

loans.use: To purchase tables and chairs to create a better ambiance in her store.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
Cecilia is a joyful, loving and hard-working mother. Her meager financial resources and the arrival of her first child did not allow her to complete secondary school. She held several different jobs in order to generate her own income and proviD. well-being and security for her baby. Now with two teenage children, she is working as an assistant in a dental clinic. In addition to this job, she sells dental supplies to dentists in the city of Juliaca, and above all to dentistry students at the two universities in the district of Puno. Cecilia's wish is to proviD. her two children with a profession, so that in the future they can have a career that allows them to make a living and get ahead in life. To put her plan into place she is asking for your kindhearted support in the form of a loan to be repaid in six months.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer

Cecilia es una alegre, amorosa y laboriosa madre, sus bajos recursos económicos y la llegada D. su primer bebé no le permitieron concluir sus estudios superiores razón por la cual se puso a trabajar en diferentes actividades para generar sus propios ingresos económicos y brindarle bienestar y seguridad a su pequeño . Actualmente ya con dos hijos adolescentes viene trabajando como asistente en una clínica dental, adicionalmente a este oficio se dedica a vender material dental a los dentistas D. la ciudad D. Juliaca y sobre todo a los estudiantes D. la carrera D. odontología D. las dos universidades del departamento D. Puno. El deseo dedoña Cecilia es ofrecerles una profesión a sus 2 hijos, para que en un futuro tengan una carrera con que defenderse y progresar en la vida, para concretar sus planes en esta oportunidad recurre a tu generoso corazón y hace la petición D. un préstamo monto que será repuesto en un lapso D. seis meses.

loans.use: Increase in capital to purchase a greater quantity of dental supplies.

loans.name: Renee

texts.es:
Renee is 22 years old and is a responsible father who is ready to work hard in order to make his family comfortable and to take care of them. He works as a chauffeur in a transportation company that covers the area in which he lives. Taking advantage of being able to move between different neighborhoods and departments, he also sells and distributes different herbal medicines. While he is working, his beloved wife Cipriana helps him in his business and also takes care of his 3 year old son, Adrian. This young husband, full of love, would like to build a little house for his family, giving them comfort, security and a better life. At the moment they live in his parents home, but knowing he would like to have a home of his own, pushes him to work even harder. He would like to take advantage of this opportunity to apply for a loan to invest in it's entirety in his business. Renee needs your collaboration in this project to make it a reality.

Translated from Spanish to English by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

Renee de 22 años de edad, es un responsable padre que está dispuesto a esforzarse y a trabajar mucho más para brindarles comodidad y bienestar a su amada familia, él trabaja como chofer en una empresa de transportes que brinda servicios de movilidad departamental a la población, aprovechando su paso por los diferentes departamentos también se dedica a la venta y distribución al por mayor de diferentes hiervas medicinales, mientras realiza estos oficios su querida esposa Cipriana, se queda al pendiente de su negocio y sobre todo al cuidado de su hijo, Adrián, de tres,añitos. El deseo que tiene este amoroso padre es construir su propia casita, con el fin de ofrecerles comodidad, seguridad y bienestar a su familia, ya que por el momento viven en el domicilio de sus padres, con esa proyección trabaja y se esfuerza mucho más. En esta oportunidad recurre a tu solidario corazón y hace la petición de un préstamo para invertirlos completamente en su negocio. Renee requiere tu colaboración para concretar su proyecto.

loans.use: To stock his products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase goods for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Expand her business

loans.name: Mardon

texts.ru:
Mardon Ordinaev is 69 years old, married and has 9 children. He has a High school education. Mardon works at the dehkansk farming business and has a small piece of land of his own. He plans to use a portion of the obtained credit to purchase fertilizer, wheat seeds, fuel and machine oil. He plans to use the other portion of the loan to purchase cattle to raise and resell. He is also in the business of making milk-products that he sells to the inhabitants of the city of Javana. Mardon plans to repay the loan over a period of 11 months.

Translated from Russian by Jane Mazur, Kiva volunteer

Одинаев Мардон– 69 лет, образование среднее, женат, имеет 9-х детей. Мардон работает работает в дехканско-фермерском хозяйстве и миеет небольшой участок собственной земли. Часть полученного кредита он хочет использовать на приобретение удобрений, семян пшеницы, горюче-смазочоных материалов, на другую часть он хочет приобрести крупный – рогатый скот для откорма и продажи. Также он занимается производством кисло-молочных продуктов и реализует его местным жителям и жителям города Явана. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 11 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase fertilizer, wheat seeds and cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase goods

loans.name: Dushan

texts.ru:
Dushan J. is 74 years old, married and has 7 children. He has a High school education. Dushan owns several hectares of land. He wishes to plant wheat. He plans to grind the obtained crop into flower and make bread for personal consumption. He is planing to repay the loan over a period of 11 months.

Translated from Russian by Jane Mazur, Kiva volunteer

Юсупов Душан– 74 года, образование среднее, женат, имеет 7-х детей. Душан имеет несолько гектаров земли, на которой хочет посеять пшеницу. Полученный урожай он планирует использовать на личные цели, так как все полученное зерно он хочет перемолоть и использовать на выпечку хлеба для личного пользования. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 11 месяцев.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer and wheat seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To relocate his shop and to purchase additional goods

loans.name: Intizor

texts.ru:
Intizor Tagoeb is 25 years old, married and has 3 children. She also has a High school education. She has a small grocery store in the Tutak village, Javansk region. Initzor plans to use the money from the loan to increase the selection of goods she has for sale. Her primary customers are the people of the village. The loan will therefore allow the locals to purchase produce in their own village as opposed to having to travel to the central market of the region located several kilometers away from where they live. Intizor is planing to repay the loan over a period of 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Jane Mazur, Kiva volunteer

Тагоева Интизор – 25 лет, образование среднее, замужем, имеет 3-х детей. Интизор имеет небольшой магазанчик в кишлаке Тутак Яванского района. Основным товаром, которым он торгует это продукты питания. Полученный кредит он хочет использовать на увелечение ассортимента продаваемого товара. Основными его покупателями являются жители данного кишлака. Полученный кредит даст возможность местным жителям приобретать необходимые продукты питания у себя в кишлаке, при этом не выезжая на центральный базар района, находящегося в нескольких километрах. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Diversify the selection of goods for sale

loans.name: Fosseni

texts.en: Fosseni K. is a 34-year-old married man. His wife is a housewife. He has a 5-year-old child who attends school. He has been selling rice, beans and rubber for 9 years. He stopped going to school early, but has since found his way forward with this business, which has been doing very well. With the first loan from the AE&I micro credit program and the capital he had earned and set aside from his business, he was able to buy a taxi. Fosseni is a courageous man who pays for his family's household expenses, his child's school fees and his brothers’ needs. He will use the loan to purchase more goods to increase his stock in order to earn enough money to buy another taxi with the profit.

loans.use: To purchase goods

loans.name: Hirobon

texts.ru:
Hirobon B. is 49 years old, married and has 4 children. She has a High School education. Hirobon has been in the business of raising cattle for the past 15 years. Her husband helps her. This business is her main source of income. She plans to use the money from the loan to purchase several additional animals that she will also raise and resell. She sells animals every 40 to 45 days and uses the obtained money to purchase young cattle. She uses the profit from her business to take care of her family.

Translated from Russian by Jane Mazur, Kiva volunteer

Боймуродова Хиробон – 49 лет, образование среднее, замужем, имеет 4-х детей. Хиробон занимается откормкой и продажей скота. Этим видом деятельности она занимается уже в течение уже 15 лет, и это является основным источником её дохода. На полученный кредит она планирует приобрести несколько голов крупного рогатого скота для откормки и продажи. Через каждые 40-45 дней она продаёт скот, а на вырученные деньги приобретает молодняк. Прибыль использует для содерждание семьи. Этим бизнесом она занимается вместе со своми мужем. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 15 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase and sale of cattle

loans.name: Orifa

texts.ru:
Orifa R., 51, is married and has 9 children. Orifa buys, feeds and sells cattle. Cattle farming has been Orifa’s business and main source of income for 5 years. Orifa plans to use this loan to purchase a few young animals, raise and then sell them. Orifa’s son assist Orifa in the business. Orifa plans to repay this loan within 15 months.

Translated from Russian by Aleksandr Zhuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Рахимова Орифа – 51 год, образование среднее, замужем, имеет 9-х детей. Орифа занимается откормкой и продажей скота. Этим видом деятельности она занимается уже в течение уже 5 лет, и это является основным источником её дохода. На полученный кредит она планирует приобрести несколько голов крупного рогатого скота для откормки и продажи. Через каждые 40-45 дней она продаёт скот, а на вырученные деньги приобретает молодняк. Прибыль использует для содерждание семьи. В этом бизнесе ей помогает её сын. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 15 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy and sell cattle

loans.name: Lucía

texts.es:
Her difficult economic situation and the misunderstanding on her parents part for her need of a good education were the principal reasons that Lucia had to quit her secondary school studies. Afterwards, she began to work at a very young age, however, despite these disadvantages, she has always tried to improve her life. She is currently the single mother of 3 small children after her husband left her without any kind of economic support. Ever since, she has worked tirelessly selling merchandise in her area and right now the products with the biggest demand are slippers, towels,underwear etc. And so, she needs to expand her collection of goods. But to do so she needs a loan with which she can travel to Tacna to purchase these items to later resell in the market at Dominical plaza in her hometown. Lucia trusts that with your help, she can improve her economic situation and improve the lives of her children by giving them the opportunity to be educated all the way through university, an opportunity she never had.

Translated from Spanish to English by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

Sus bajos recursos económicos y el desentendimiento de sus padres por su educación fueron las razones que Lucia tuvo para abandonar sus estudios secundarios y ponerse a trabajar a muy corta edad, pese a las dificultades que le puso la vida siempre trato de sobresalir. Actualmente es padre y madre de sus 3 hijos, puesto que su esposo la abandonó sin ningún respaldo económico cuando sus éstos aún eran muy pequeños, desde entonces trabajó perseverantemente en su negocio de venta de mercadería por campañas, en esta temporada el producto de mayor demanda es la venta de pantuflas, toallas, ropas interiores, etc. es por esa razón que desea aumentar el volumen de su mercadería y requiere obtener un préstamo de dinero con el que tiene programado viajar a la ciudad de Tacna para adquirir los artículos a fin de venderlos en la plaza Dominical de la ciudad de Juliaca. Lucia confiá que con tu apoyo su situación económica mejoraráy así sus hijos tendrán la oportunidad de ir y concluir sus estudios universitarios, oportunidad que ella nunca tuvo.

loans.use: To purchase more products for the summer.

loans.name: Máximo

texts.es:
Roger's family is well known in his neighborhood, because they have offered generations of excellent services, repairing and painting cars. He inherited his job and his knowledge of the trade from his beloved father, who included him in his work ever since his son was very small so that he could teach him. Now married and having 4 children of his own, Roger tries to set a good example and to take care of his family. This is why he is concerned with ensuring a quick and quality service to his clients, thanks to whom, he is recommended to others and able to continue his work.

Roger would like to purchase more tools for his workshop so that he can improve his service. In order to cement his plans into action, he needs a loan that will be very well invested. Roger is certain that with your help he can improve his and his family's standard of living, don't hesitate, he is waiting for your help.

Translated from Spanish to English by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

La familia de Roger es muy conocida dentro de su localidad, porque generación tras generación vienen brindando excelentes servicios de planchado y pintado de carros, este oficio y sus conocimientos los heredó de su querido padre quien desde niño y en todo momento trató de inculcarle e instruirle en esta actividad. Ahora ya casado y con 4 hijos trata de darles el mejor ejemplo y bienestar a su familia, por esa razón trabaja brindando un buen y rápido servicio a su clientela, gracias a eso constantemente van recomendando su trabajo a otros potenciales clientes. El deseo de Roger es adquirir algunas herramientas con el fin de desenvolverse mucho mejor, agilizar su trabajo y fortalecer su taller, para concretar sus planes requiere obtener un préstamo de dinero que será muy bien invertido en las manos de Roger. Roger está seguro que con tu apoyo podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, no lo defraudes, él espera por ti.

loans.use: To purchase tools for his workshop.

loans.name: Julie

texts.en: Julie M. is a 35-year-old married woman. Her husband is a taxi driver. She has 3 children who attend primary and high school. She has been selling “attieke” made with cassava (a local food) and fried fish, a food appreciated by Ivorian people. She used her first loan from AE&I to increase her goods. She sells her food outside and next to a road, which is a problem for customers because cars and taxis stir up dust in the area of the restaurant. She uses the money from her business to help her husband with their household expenses. She hopes to settle down in a better place for her health and for the health of her customers. She will use the loan as capital to improve business conditions and to earn additional profit.

loans.use: To improve business conditions

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
In one of the neighborhoods on the outskirts of Juliaca, Mrs. Carmen lives in a humble home, wrapping up salads that she prepares and then sells to school stores, sweets kiosks and other stores in her area. She also works with her husband, whose unconditional support of his family has led him to making armellas (ropes used to tie cows in place). When he has a large quantity he sells them himself in the market. The earnings they make help to support their home and their family, improving their standard of living considerably. Mrs. Carmen would like to expand their distribution, and so she and her husband work tirelessly and encourage all the members of the family to participate. To secure her plans, she needs a loan that she and her husband will invest in purchasing more raw materials to process and to later sell as finished products. We can all help to make her dreams a reality.

Translated from Spanish to English by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

En uno de los barrios más lejanos de la ciudad de Juliaca encontramos a doña Carmenen su humilde domicilio embolsando muy contenta las habas saladas que prepara para luego distribuirlas en las distintas tiendas escolares, puestos de golosinas y bodeguitas de su localidad; adicionalmente a este trabajo su esposo con apoyo incondicional de sus laboriosos hijos se dedica a la fabricación de armellas (ganchos que se utilizan para amarrar la soguilla de los ganados) que luego de una cantidad considerable las distribuyen al por mayor para su venta respectiva.Los ingresos que perciben por estas actividades ayuda a la manutención de su familiapermitiéndoles mejorar considerablemente su condición y calidad de vida.Doña Carmen desea ser la distribuidora mayor de estos productos, con ese afán trabajan y se esfuerzan todos los miembros de su familia.Para concretar sus planes requiere obtener un préstamo de dinero que será invertido en adquirir mayor cantidad de materia prima, para procesar y vender satisfactoriamente su mercadería. Hagamos realidad los sueños de doña Carmen.

loans.use: To purchase more raw material for the two economic activities of the family .

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en: T. is a 37-year-old man who lives in Williamsville, a populated suburb in the north of Abidjan with his wife. They are married but do not have a child yet. He has been in business for 13 years and has been able to earn enough money to support his family.  His wife is also selling in the market where her husband owns a store selling rice in bulk. He wants to expand his business and diversify his product range by selling other goods. He will use the loan to purchase goods from the largest wholesaler, in order to get lower prices and improve his margin. He joined the AE&I micro credit programs and has performed well since then.

loans.use: To expand the business and diversify the business's product range by purchasing goods from a wholesaler

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es:
Feliciano is a generous and involved father, ever since he left his home town of Capachica with his family of 6 children and his beloved wife. He has decided that with what little savings he has, he would buy a tricycle from which he could sell items throughout the district of Juliaqueña. This work which has taken much hard work and diligence to succeed and begins at 4am and lasts until 6pm. However, it has allowed him to take care of his household needs, even if it isn't yet enough to send his children to higher education. Feliciano and his wife Hilda, who knits beautiful chompas, or sweaters, would like to purchase a larger bicycle to outfit it from which to sell sweets, cookies and a wide variety of drinks. With the earnings they will make, they would like to pay for the higher education of their 6 children. Your help is very important in accomplishing the goals of this father.

Translated from Spanish to English by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

Feliciano, es una voluntarioso y comprometido padre, desde que salió de su pueblo natal Capachica en compañía de su familia integrada por sus seis hijos y su querida esposa. Decidió adquirir con el poco ahorro que tenía un triciclo, a fin de brindar servicio de movilidad a la población Juliaqueña.Esta labor que desempeña con mucho esfuerzo y diligencia desde las 4:00 de la mañana hasta las 6:00 de la tarde, le ha permitido cubrir las necesidades de su hogar, pero aún no es suficiente para pagar los estudios superiores que dentro de poco tiempo seguirán sus hijos.Con el fin de generar ingresos extras don Feliciano y su esposa Hilda, que está dedicada al tejido de hermosas chompas, tienen pensado adquirir un triciclo de carga y adecuarlo para ofrecer y vender golosinas, galletas y una inmensa variedad de bebidas, con las ganancias que obtengan cubrir los gastos de estudios que demandan sus seis queridos hijos.“Tu ayuda es muy importante para cumplir los objetivos de este responsable padre”

loans.use: To purchase a bicycle to outfit and sell cookies, caramels and drinks.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
Josefina, despite her advanced age, remains eager to progress in life. After spending her entire life in Capachica, the village where she was born, she recently decided to move. Currently she is living in a humble and somewhat remote neighborhood of the city of Juliaca, where which she continues patiently and skillfully creating her beautiful and colorful woven blankets with her hardworking and agile hands. Since she was widowed, this hardworking mother dedicated every moment to giving the best to her children, who, now that they are grown and independent, return the love, patience and attention that they received. Josefina would like to acquire more raw material in order to continue crafting her beautiful and unique blankets. With this end in mind, she is requesting a loan which she commits to repay in a period of six months. She anxiously awaits your response.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva volunteer.

Josefina, pese a su avanzada edad sigue deseosa D. progresar en la vida, después D. pasar su vida entera en su pueblo natal, Capachica, decidió salir D. ella. Actualmente radica en un humilD. y alejado barrio D. la ciudad D. Juliaca en el que sigue elaborando muy hábil y pacientemente sus hermosas y coloridas frazadas tejidas con sus ágiles y trabajadoras manos.DesD. que quedó viuda esta trabajadora madre en todo momento trató D. brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos, ahora ellos ya mayores e independientes corresponden a su madre con el mismo amor, paciencia y atención que recibieron.El deseo D. doña Josefina es adquirir mayor cantidad D. materia prima para seguir fabricando sus hermosas y resaltantes frazadas, con ese fin hace la solicitud D. un préstamo que se compromete a retornarlo en un lapso D. seis meses.Josefina espera ansiosa tu respuesta.

loans.use: Purchase of a larger quantity and a wider variety of raw materials.

loans.name: Bernarda De Lourdes

texts.es:
Bernarda M. has been selling vegetables for the past 19 years, in a location at the market in the Leon bus station. She began with an investment of some money that she had worked for and saved.

She started her business walking along the streets of Leon carrying a small container where she placed her vegetables. When she realized that this was not enough to support her five small children, she decided, in hopes of being able to progess little by little, to ask for a loan from CEPRODEL, who extended her a friendly hand and helped her get ahead in her business. Today she has been able to develop the business, obtaining a bit more in income so as to buy vegetables.

The continuous work of Bernarda allows her to sustain her five children, and that they complete university studies is her greatest dream for them to improve their standard of living.

Translated to Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer.

La Sra. Bernarda M. se dedica a la actividad de venta de verduras desde hace 19 años ubicada en el mercado La Estación en León. Inicia con un capital inicial de C$ 1500 (Un mil quinientos córdobas), producto de sus esfuerzos en ahorros.

Su negocio lo inicia vendiendo ambulante en las calles de León con una pana donde colocaba sus verduras, sin embargo al darse cuenta que este negocio no le cubría para mantener a sus cinco pequeños hijos, decide con la esperanza de ir progresando poco a poco solicitar préstamos a CEPRODEL quien le extiende su mano amiga y le ayuda para salir adelante en su negocio. Hoy en día ha logrado el desarrollo de su negocio obteniendo un poco mas de ingresos para la compra de las verduras.

El trabajo continuo de la dama Bernarda le permite el sustento de sus cinco hijos y el que coronen una carrera universitaria es su mayor sueño para que logren mejorar su nivel de vida.

loans.use: Purchase vegetables.
